name: "Panoramic Landscapes of the Coronado Peninsula" - Photography Tour
description:
With its perfect
weather year round, white sandy beaches, and incredible seascapes, San
Diego is a photographer’s paradise. Having been a photo-fanatic for over 20 years, I've scoped
out the best spots in the area and will take you to my favorite locations around the Coronado Peninsula. At each spot let’s
go over a little history,
enjoy the panoramic scenery, and take some fabulous shots. If you like, I’ll also take some portrait-worthy photos of you and your
family or friends in front of the scenic landscapes. You'll be sure to
have some great memories to go home with.
